welcome_message_body: Welcome to Farmington Hills, where small-town charm meets big-city amenities. Explore our beautiful parks, vibrant downtown, and rich history, and discover why we're known as a hidden gem in the heart of Michigan. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit City Airport handles all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Executive Terminal
terminals.description: The executive terminal at Detroit City Airport is used for private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport. Network name and password are displayed on screens throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: McNamara Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, mainly serving low-cost carriers and some international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and military flights at Selfridge ANGB Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.
